title: 90% Indian tech CEOs predict double-digit growth in hiring in 2022: Survey - CNBCTV18
content: 90% Indian tech CEOs predict double-digit growth in hiring in 2022: Survey  CNBCTV18
description: According to the Nasscom Tech CEO Survey 2022, about 90 percent Indian tech CEOs hope to witness double-digit growth in hiring, and 60 percent expect employees to return to office this year. The survey gathered responses from C-suite executives belonging to large, medium, and small-sized IT firms, global capability centres (GCCs), and start-ups.
